TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationCredentials extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationCredentials Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者認證，該使用者認證使用表單型驗證。

span.span: Configures user credentials for ASP.NET applications that use form-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改`credentials`元素`forms`一節中`authentication`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `credentials` element of a `forms` section in the `authentication` section of the configuration file. 此類型屬於的群組，其中包含、 ，而型別。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 集合型別中，除了其他所有項目會直接影響基礎的組態標記。With the exception of the collection type, all the others directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可以將資訊寫入組態檔，根據定義的限制相關區段。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by . 任何嘗試寫入組態檔不允許在階層中的層級，將會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取階層架構中的任何層級的組態資訊。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 基於安全性和延展性，建議您使用外部儲存機制，例如資料庫、 使用，來保留使用者的認證。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的數個屬性的值`credentials`區段，也可以做為成員的存取類別。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `credentials` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定值`credentials`> 一節。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `credentials` section. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用`credentials`區段中，務必遵循的指導方針，說明請參閱[ASP.NET 驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 延展性和較佳的安全性，建議您使用外部資料庫儲存使用者的認證。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 如需有關建立安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式的詳細資訊，請搜尋 Microsoft MSDN 網站 (http://msdn.microsoft.com)如 「 保護 ASP.NET 應用程式 」 和 「 建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式： 驗證、 授權和安全通訊."For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (http://msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class.
